articles.author: Nadine Schmidt and Schams Elwazer, CNN
articles.title: At least 6 killed in Germany as flooding caused by rainfall 'not seen in 100 years' hits Europe - CNN
articles.description: Torrential rain has caused severe floods in several western European countries, including Germany -- where at least six people have died -- as well as in Belgium, Luxembourg and the Netherlands.

articles.description: European Union court rules companies may ban Muslim employees from wearing a headscarf under certain conditions.
articles.content:
